name: Paradise Lost (itch) (Vladoman)
description:
Paradise Lost is 2D Platformer with the incorporation of a puzzle mini-game. It is created as a part of the debut edition of the SEA Game Jam 2022, created by Team Elysium.

Explore a mystical city submerged at the bottom of a lake, collect the golden puzzle pieces and solve the puzzle to discover the lore behind this long gone utopia.
